children.name: Theme A All
children.description: All Questions in Theme A Space, Time & Motion

children.name: A.1 - Kinematics
children.description: Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Uniform Acceleration Equations, Projectile Motion

children.name: A.2 - Forces & Momentum
children.description: Forces, Free-Body Diagrams, Newton's Laws, Friction, Equilibrium, Momentum, Impulse, Collisions, Circular Motion

children.name: A.3 - Work, Energy, and Power
children.description: Work, Kinetic Energy, Gravitational and Elastic Potential Energy, Power, Conservation of Energy, Efficiency

children.name: A.4 - Rotational Mechanics
children.description: Torque, Angular Speed, Angular Acceleration, Moment of Inertia, Angular Momentum, Rotational Kinetic Energy

children.name: A.5 - Special Relativity
children.description: Reference Frames, Galilean Relativity, Special Relativity, Lorentz Transformations, Space-Time Diagrams, Simultaneity

children.name: Theme B All
children.description: All Questions in Theme B The Particulate Nature of Matter

children.name: B.1 - Thermal Energy Transfers
children.description: Kinetic Theory, Temperature, Internal Energy, Specific Heat Capacity, Latent Heat, Heat Transfer, Stefan-Boltzmann Law

children.name: B.2 - Greenhouse Effect
children.description: Emissivity, Albedo, Solar Constant, Greenhouse Effect

children.name: B.3 - Ideal Gas Model
children.description: Pressure, Gas Laws, Ideal Gases, Ideal Gas Law, Moles, Ideal vs. Real Gases

children.name: B.4 - Thermodynamics
children.description: Laws of Thermodynamics, Adiabatic, Isobaric, Isothermal and Isovolumetric Processes, Heat Engines, Carnot Cycle, Entropy

children.name: B.5 - Electric Circuits
children.description: Cells, Circuits, Resistivity, Ohm's Law, Series & Parallel Circuits, Power In Circuits, Internal Resistance

children.name: Theme C All
children.description: All Questions in Theme C Wave Behaviour

children.name: C.1 - Simple Harmonic Motion
children.description: Simple Harmonic Motion, Period, Frequency, Amplitude, Simple Pendulum, Mass-Spring System, Energy Changes, Graphs Of SHM

children.name: C.2 - Travelling Waves
children.description: Transverse Waves, Longitudinal Waves, Sound Waves, Electromagnetic Waves, Wave Equation

children.name: C.3 - Refraction, Diffraction, Superposition, and Interference
children.description: Reflection, Diffraction, Snell's Law, Superposition, Single-Slit, Two-Source & Multi-Slit Diffraction and Interference

children.name: C.4 - Standing Waves & Resonance
children.description: Standing Waves, Vibrating Strings, Vibrating Air Columns, Resonance, Damping

children.name: C.5 - Doppler Effect
children.description: Moving Source & Moving Observer Doppler Effects

children.name: Theme D All
children.description: All Questions in Theme D Fields

children.name: D.1 - Gravitational Fields & Potential
children.description: Gravitational Fields, Orbits, Kepler's Laws, Orbital Speed, Gravitational Potential, Energy in Orbits, Escape Speed

children.name: D.2 - Electromagnetic Fields & Potential
children.description: Coulomb's Law, Electric and Magnetic Fields, Millikan's Experiment, Electrostatics, Electric Potential, Equipotentials

children.name: D.3 - Motion in Electromagnetic Fields
children.description: Charges Moving in Electric and Magnetic Fields, Forces on Current-carrying Wires, Magnetic Fields Due to Currents

children.name: D.4 - Electromagnetic Induction
children.description: Magnetic Flux, Faraday's Law of Induction, Motion EMF, Lenz' Law

children.name: Theme E All
children.description: All Questions in Theme E Nuclear & Quantum Physics

children.name: E.1 - Atomic Structure
children.description: Emission & Absorption Spectra, Rutherford Scattering, Bohr Hydrogen Model, Quantization of Angular Momentum.

children.name: E.2 - Quantum Physics
children.description: Photoelectric Effect, Wave-Particle Duality, de Broglie Wavelength, Compton Scattering

children.name: E.3 - Radioactive Decay
children.description: Binding Energy, Mass-Energy Equivalence, Strong Nuclear Force, Quantitative Radioactive Decay, Half-Life, Neutrinos

children.name: E.4 - Nuclear Fission
children.description: Nuclear Fission, Chain Reactions, Nuclear Power Generation

children.name: E.5 - Stellar Properties & Processes
children.description: Nuclear Fusion in Stars, Stellar Evolution, Stellar Parallax, Stellar Spectra

children.name: All
children.description: All Questions in    Scientific Skills & Tools

children.name: Scientific Skills & Tools
children.description: Measurement, Processing Uncertainties, Vectors, SI Units, Significant Figures, Accuracy, Precision
